summary: Build an application with a password-protected admin panel accessible via an admin quick link, and include visibility of quote requests within the admin panel.
architectural_notes: Admin panel must be gated behind an admin quick link and password authentication (do not display admin UI by default).
Avoid hardcoding passwords in client-side code; store secrets securely and authenticate server-side.

existing_features.title: Hide the admin panel UI by default and only reveal it after the user clicks an "Admin" quick link and successfully enters the password "PonytaPower17!".

Add an "Admin" quick link in the site footer Quick Links list that triggers the same admin unlock flow as the header Admin button (open password prompt when locked; scroll to admin section when unlocked).

new_feature_requests.summary: Hide admin panel by default; only show it after clicking an admin quick link and entering a password.
Add quote request visibility/listing within the admin panel.
Within the unlocked admin panel, ensure quote requests submitted via the public contact/quote form are visible in an admin "Quote Forms" / "Quotes" view.

projectName: Gate admin panel behind quick link + password and ensure Quote Requests are visible in admin UI
